# healthyR.ai

> **The Machine Learning and AI Modeling Companion to healthyR**

To view the full wiki, click here: [Full healthyR.ai
Wiki](https://github.com/spsanderson/healthyR.ai/blob/master/wiki/Home.md)

`healthyR.ai` is a comprehensive R package designed to streamline
machine learning and AI workflows for healthcare data analysis. It
provides an intuitive, consistent verb-based framework that simplifies
data exploration, transformation, and modeling‚Äîtaking the guesswork out
of healthcare analytics.

## ‚ú® Key Features

### ü§ñ AutoML Functions

Automated machine learning with hyperparameter tuning for multiple
algorithms: - **Tree-based models**: C5.0, Cubist, Random Forest
(Ranger), XGBoost - **Support Vector Machines**: Polynomial and RBF
kernels - **Linear models**: GLMnet (elastic net regression) -
**Instance-based**: K-Nearest Neighbors (KNN) - **MARS**: Multivariate
Adaptive Regression Splines (Earth)

### üìä Clustering & Dimensionality Reduction

- **K-Means AutoML**: Automatic optimal cluster detection with scree
  plots and elbow methods
- **UMAP**: Uniform Manifold Approximation and Projection for
  visualization
- **PCA**: Principal Component Analysis with loadings plots

### üîß Data Preprocessing & Transformation

- **Scaling functions**: Zero-one normalization, z-score standardization
- **Statistical transformations**: Fourier, hyperbolic, polynomial
  transformations
- **Robust methods**: Winsorization (truncate and move)
- **Custom recipe steps**: Seamless integration with `tidymodels`

### üìà Visualization & Analysis

- **Control charts**: Statistical process control for healthcare metrics
- **Distribution analysis**: Density plots, histograms, Q-Q plots
- **Statistical measures**: Skewness, kurtosis, range statistics
- **Color-blind friendly palettes**: Accessible visualizations

## üì¶ Installation

Install the released version from [CRAN](https://CRAN.R-project.org):

``` r
install.packages("healthyR.ai")
```

Or get the development version from
[GitHub](https://github.com/spsanderson/healthyR.ai):

``` r
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("spsanderson/healthyR.ai")
```

## üöÄ Quick Start

### Control Charts for Healthcare Monitoring

``` r
library(healthyR.ai)
library(ggplot2)

# Create sample adverse events data
data_tbl <- tibble::tibble(
  day = sample(c("Monday", "Tuesday", "Wednesday", "Thursday", "Friday"), 100, TRUE),
  person = sample(c("Tom", "Jane", "Alex"), 100, TRUE),
  count = rbinom(100, 20, ifelse(day == "Friday", .5, .2)),
  date = Sys.Date() - sample.int(100)
)

# Generate control chart
my_chart <- hai_control_chart(data_tbl, count, date)
```

![](reference/figures/README-example_control_chart-1.png)

``` r
my_chart +
  ylab("Number of Adverse Events") +
  scale_x_date(name = "Week of...", date_breaks = "week") +
  theme(axis.text.x = element_text(angle = -90, vjust = 0.5, hjust = 1))
```

![](reference/figures/README-example_control_chart-2.png)

### AutoML with K-Nearest Neighbors

``` r
library(healthyR.ai)
library(recipes)
library(dplyr)

# Prepare your data
data_split <- rsample::initial_split(mtcars, prop = 0.8)
train_data <- rsample::training(data_split)
test_data <- rsample::testing(data_split)

# Create a recipe
rec_obj <- recipes::recipe(mpg ~ ., data = train_data)

# Run AutoML KNN
knn_results <- hai_auto_knn(
  .data = train_data,
  .rec_obj = rec_obj,
  .best_metric = "rmse",
  .model_type = "regression"
)

# Access the best model
best_model <- knn_results$model_info %>%
  dplyr::filter(model_spec == knn_results$best_model_spec) %>%
  dplyr::pull(model)
```

### K-Means Clustering with AutoML

``` r
library(healthyR.ai)
library(dplyr)

# Prepare data
data_tbl <- healthyR.data::healthyR_data %>%
  dplyr::select(length_of_stay, age) %>%
  dplyr::filter(length_of_stay < 20)

# Auto K-Means - finds optimal clusters
kmeans_obj <- hai_kmeans_automl(
  .data = data_tbl,
  .max_clusters = 15
)

# Visualize the scree plot
hai_kmeans_scree_plot(kmeans_obj)

# Get user-item tibble for analysis
hai_kmeans_user_item_tbl(kmeans_obj)
```

### Data Preprocessing with Custom Steps

``` r
library(healthyR.ai)
library(recipes)

# Create a recipe with custom preprocessing steps
rec <- recipe(mpg ~ ., data = mtcars) %>%
  step_hai_scale_zscore(all_numeric_predictors()) %>%
  step_hai_fourier(disp, period = 365, order = 1) %>%
  step_hai_hyperbolic(hp, wt)

# Prep and bake
prepped_rec <- prep(rec)
transformed_data <- bake(prepped_rec, new_data = NULL)
```

## üìö Documentation

- **Website**: <https://www.spsanderson.com/healthyR.ai/>
- **Function Reference**: Browse all available functions and their
  documentation
- **Vignettes**: In-depth tutorials and use cases
  - [Getting Started with
    healthyR.ai](https://www.spsanderson.com/healthyR.ai/articles/getting-started.html)
  - [Auto K-Means
    Clustering](https://www.spsanderson.com/healthyR.ai/articles/auto-kmeans.html)
  - [K-Means and
    UMAP](https://www.spsanderson.com/healthyR.ai/articles/kmeans-umap.html)

## üéØ Use Cases

`healthyR.ai` is designed for healthcare data analysts and data
scientists who need to:

- **Predict length of stay** for hospital patients
- **Forecast readmission rates** with multiple algorithms
- **Monitor quality metrics** using control charts
- **Identify patient cohorts** through clustering
- **Preprocess and transform** healthcare data for modeling
- **Automate hyperparameter tuning** across multiple model types
- **Visualize distributions** and identify outliers

## ü§ù Contributing

We welcome contributions! If you‚Äôd like to contribute to `healthyR.ai`:

1.  Fork the repository
2.  Create a feature branch (`git checkout -b feature/amazing-feature`)
3.  Commit your changes (`git commit -m 'Add amazing feature'`)
4.  Push to the branch (`git push origin feature/amazing-feature`)
5.  Open a Pull Request

## üêõ Issues & Feature Requests

Found a bug or have a feature request? Please file an issue at:
<https://github.com/spsanderson/healthyR.ai/issues>

If you find this package useful, please leave a star on
[GitHub](https://github.com/spsanderson/healthyR.ai)! ‚≠ê

## üìñ Citation

If you use `healthyR.ai` in your research, please cite it:

``` r
citation("healthyR.ai")
```

## üë®‚Äçüíª Author

**Steven P. Sanderson II, MPH** - Website:
<https://www.spsanderson.com/> - GitHub:
[@spsanderson](https://github.com/spsanderson) - ORCID:
[0009-0006-7661-8247](https://orcid.org/0009-0006-7661-8247)

## üìÑ License

MIT ¬© Steven P. Sanderson II, MPH

## üôè Acknowledgments

`healthyR.ai` builds upon the excellent work of the
[`tidymodels`](https://www.tidymodels.org/) ecosystem and integrates
seamlessly with: - `recipes` for data preprocessing - `parsnip` for
unified model interfaces - `tune` for hyperparameter optimization -
`workflows` for streamlined modeling pipelines - `yardstick` for model
evaluation

Special thanks to all contributors and the R community for their
support!

# Package index

## Plotting Functions

Functions for plotting

- [`hai_control_chart()`](https://www.spsanderson.com/healthyR.ai/reference/hai_control_chart.md)
  : Create a control chart
- [`hai_density_hist_plot()`](https://www.spsanderson.com/healthyR.ai/reference/hai_density_hist_plot.md)
  : Density Histogram Plot
- [`hai_density_plot()`](https://www.spsanderson.com/healthyR.ai/reference/hai_density_plot.md)
  : Density Histogram Plot
- [`hai_density_qq_plot()`](https://www.spsanderson.com/healthyR.ai/reference/hai_density_qq_plot.md)
  : Density QQ Plot
- [`hai_histogram_facet_plot()`](https://www.spsanderson.com/healthyR.ai/reference/hai_histogram_facet_plot.md)
  : Histogram Facet Plot
- [`hai_kmeans_scree_plt()`](https://www.spsanderson.com/healthyR.ai/reference/hai_kmeans_scree_plt.md)
  [`kmeans_scree_plt()`](https://www.spsanderson.com/healthyR.ai/reference/hai_kmeans_scree_plt.md)
  [`hai_kmeans_scree_plot()`](https://www.spsanderson.com/healthyR.ai/reference/hai_kmeans_scree_plt.md)
  : K-Means Scree Plot
- [`hai_umap_plot()`](https://www.spsanderson.com/healthyR.ai/reference/hai_umap_plot.md)
  [`umap_plt()`](https://www.spsanderson.com/healthyR.ai/reference/hai_umap_plot.md)
  : UMAP and K-Means Cluster Visualization
- [`color_blind()`](https://www.spsanderson.com/healthyR.ai/reference/color_blind.md)
  : Provide Colorblind Compliant Colors
- [`hai_scale_color_colorblind()`](https://www.spsanderson.com/healthyR.ai/reference/hai_scale_color_colorblind.md)
  : Provide Colorblind Compliant Colors
- [`hai_scale_fill_colorblind()`](https://www.spsanderson.com/healthyR.ai/reference/hai_scale_fill_colorblind.md)
  : Provide Colorblind Compliant Colors

## Clustering Functions

Functions for Clustering and Analysis

### K-Means

- [`hai_kmeans_automl()`](https://www.spsanderson.com/healthyR.ai/reference/hai_kmeans_automl.md)
  : Automatic K-Means H2O
- [`hai_kmeans_automl_predict()`](https://www.spsanderson.com/healthyR.ai/reference/hai_kmeans_automl_predict.md)
  : Automatic K-Means H2O
- [`hai_kmeans_mapped_tbl()`](https://www.spsanderson.com/healthyR.ai/reference/hai_kmeans_mapped_tbl.md)
  [`kmeans_mapped_tbl()`](https://www.spsanderson.com/healthyR.ai/reference/hai_kmeans_mapped_tbl.md)
  : K-Means Mapping Function
- [`hai_kmeans_obj()`](https://www.spsanderson.com/healthyR.ai/reference/hai_kmeans_obj.md)
  [`kmeans_obj()`](https://www.spsanderson.com/healthyR.ai/reference/hai_kmeans_obj.md)
  : K-Means Object
- [`hai_kmeans_scree_data_tbl()`](https://www.spsanderson.com/healthyR.ai/reference/hai_kmeans_scree_data_tbl.md)
  [`kmeans_scree_data_tbl()`](https://www.spsanderson.com/healthyR.ai/reference/hai_kmeans_scree_data_tbl.md)
  : K-Means Scree Plot Data Table
- [`hai_kmeans_scree_plt()`](https://www.spsanderson.com/healthyR.ai/reference/hai_kmeans_scree_plt.md)
  [`kmeans_scree_plt()`](https://www.spsanderson.com/healthyR.ai/reference/hai_kmeans_scree_plt.md)
  [`hai_kmeans_scree_plot()`](https://www.spsanderson.com/healthyR.ai/reference/hai_kmeans_scree_plt.md)
  : K-Means Scree Plot
- [`hai_kmeans_tidy_tbl()`](https://www.spsanderson.com/healthyR.ai/reference/hai_kmeans_tidy_tbl.md)
  [`kmeans_tidy_tbl()`](https://www.spsanderson.com/healthyR.ai/reference/hai_kmeans_tidy_tbl.md)
  : K-Means Object Tidy Functions

## Boiler Plate functions

Functions for automatic Recipes, Workflows and Tuned models.

- [`hai_auto_c50()`](https://www.spsanderson.com/healthyR.ai/reference/hai_auto_c50.md)
  : Boilerplate Workflow
- [`hai_auto_cubist()`](https://www.spsanderson.com/healthyR.ai/reference/hai_auto_cubist.md)
  : Boilerplate Workflow
- [`hai_auto_earth()`](https://www.spsanderson.com/healthyR.ai/reference/hai_auto_earth.md)
  : Boilerplate Workflow
- [`hai_auto_glmnet()`](https://www.spsanderson.com/healthyR.ai/reference/hai_auto_glmnet.md)
  : Boilerplate Workflow
- [`hai_auto_knn()`](https://www.spsanderson.com/healthyR.ai/reference/hai_auto_knn.md)
  : Boilerplate Workflow
- [`hai_auto_ranger()`](https://www.spsanderson.com/healthyR.ai/reference/hai_auto_ranger.md)
  : Boilerplate Workflow
- [`hai_auto_svm_poly()`](https://www.spsanderson.com/healthyR.ai/reference/hai_auto_svm_poly.md)
  : Boilerplate Workflow
- [`hai_auto_svm_rbf()`](https://www.spsanderson.com/healthyR.ai/reference/hai_auto_svm_rbf.md)
  : Boilerplate Workflow
- [`hai_auto_wflw_metrics()`](https://www.spsanderson.com/healthyR.ai/reference/hai_auto_wflw_metrics.md)
  : Collect Metrics from Boilerplat Workflows
- [`hai_auto_xgboost()`](https://www.spsanderson.com/healthyR.ai/reference/hai_auto_xgboost.md)
  : Boilerplate Workflow

  : Prep Data for Earth - Recipe

  : Prep Data for glmnet - Recipe

  : Prep Data for k-NN - Recipe
- [`hai_ranger_data_prepper()`](https://www.spsanderson.com/healthyR.ai/reference/hai_ranger_data_prepper.md)
  : Prep Data for Ranger - Recipe

  : Prep Data for XGBoost - Recipe

  : Data Preprocessor - Polynomial Function

  : Data Preprocessor - Scale/Normalize
- [`hai_data_transform()`](https://www.spsanderson.com/healthyR.ai/reference/hai_data_transform.md)
  : Data Preprocessor - Transformation Functions
- [`hai_data_trig()`](https://www.spsanderson.com/healthyR.ai/reference/hai_data_trig.md)
  : Data Preprocessor - Trigonometric Functions
- [`pca_your_recipe()`](https://www.spsanderson.com/healthyR.ai/reference/pca_your_recipe.md)
  : Perform PCA

## Recipe Steps

Functions to add recipe steps

- [`step_hai_fourier()`](https://www.spsanderson.com/healthyR.ai/reference/step_hai_fourier.md)
  : Recipes Step Fourier Generator
- [`step_hai_fourier_discrete()`](https://www.spsanderson.com/healthyR.ai/reference/step_hai_fourier_discrete.md)
  : Recipes Step Fourier Discrete Generator
- [`step_hai_hyperbolic()`](https://www.spsanderson.com/healthyR.ai/reference/step_hai_hyperbolic.md)
  : Recipes Step Hyperbolic Generator
- [`step_hai_scale_zero_one()`](https://www.spsanderson.com/healthyR.ai/reference/step_hai_scale_zero_one.md)
  : Recipes Data Scale to Zero and One
- [`step_hai_scale_zscore()`](https://www.spsanderson.com/healthyR.ai/reference/step_hai_scale_zscore.md)
  : Recipes Data Scale by Z-Score
- [`step_hai_winsorized_move()`](https://www.spsanderson.com/healthyR.ai/reference/step_hai_winsorized_move.md)
  : Recipes Step Winsorized Move Generator
- [`step_hai_winsorized_truncate()`](https://www.spsanderson.com/healthyR.ai/reference/step_hai_winsorized_truncate.md)
  : Recipes Step Winsorized Truncate Generator

Functions that return tibbles

  : K-Means Mapping Function
- [`hai_kmeans_scree_data_tbl()`](https://www.spsanderson.com/healthyR.ai/reference/hai_kmeans_scree_data_tbl.md)
  [`kmeans_scree_data_tbl()`](https://www.spsanderson.com/healthyR.ai/reference/hai_kmeans_scree_data_tbl.md)
  : K-Means Scree Plot Data Table

  [`kmeans_tidy_tbl()`](https://www.spsanderson.com/healthyR.ai/reference/hai_kmeans_tidy_tbl.md)
  : K-Means Object Tidy Functions
- [`hai_kmeans_user_item_tbl()`](https://www.spsanderson.com/healthyR.ai/reference/hai_kmeans_user_item_tbl.md)
  [`kmeans_user_item_tbl()`](https://www.spsanderson.com/healthyR.ai/reference/hai_kmeans_user_item_tbl.md)

## Vectorized Functions

- [`hai_fourier_discrete_vec()`](https://www.spsanderson.com/healthyR.ai/reference/hai_fourier_discrete_vec.md)
  : Vector Function Discrete Fourier
- [`hai_fourier_vec()`](https://www.spsanderson.com/healthyR.ai/reference/hai_fourier_vec.md)
  : Vector Function Fourier
- [`hai_hyperbolic_vec()`](https://www.spsanderson.com/healthyR.ai/reference/hai_hyperbolic_vec.md)
  : Vector Function Hyperbolic
- [`hai_kurtosis_vec()`](https://www.spsanderson.com/healthyR.ai/reference/hai_kurtosis_vec.md)
  : Compute Kurtosis of a Vector
- [`hai_scale_zero_one_vec()`](https://www.spsanderson.com/healthyR.ai/reference/hai_scale_zero_one_vec.md)
  : Vector Function Scale to Zero and One
- [`hai_scale_zscore_vec()`](https://www.spsanderson.com/healthyR.ai/reference/hai_scale_zscore_vec.md)
  : Vector Function Scale to Zero and One
- [`hai_skewness_vec()`](https://www.spsanderson.com/healthyR.ai/reference/hai_skewness_vec.md)
  : Compute Skewness of a Vector
- [`hai_winsorized_move_vec()`](https://www.spsanderson.com/healthyR.ai/reference/hai_winsorized_move_vec.md)
  : Vector Function Winsorize Move
- [`hai_winsorized_truncate_vec()`](https://www.spsanderson.com/healthyR.ai/reference/hai_winsorized_truncate_vec.md)
  : Vector Function Winsorize Truncate

## Augmenting Functions

- [`hai_fourier_augment()`](https://www.spsanderson.com/healthyR.ai/reference/hai_fourier_augment.md)
  : Augment Function Fourier
- [`hai_fourier_discrete_augment()`](https://www.spsanderson.com/healthyR.ai/reference/hai_fourier_discrete_augment.md)
  : Augment Function Fourier Discrete
- [`hai_hyperbolic_augment()`](https://www.spsanderson.com/healthyR.ai/reference/hai_hyperbolic_augment.md)
  : Augment Function Hyperbolic
- [`hai_polynomial_augment()`](https://www.spsanderson.com/healthyR.ai/reference/hai_polynomial_augment.md)
  : Augment Polynomial Features
- [`hai_scale_zero_one_augment()`](https://www.spsanderson.com/healthyR.ai/reference/hai_scale_zero_one_augment.md)
  : Augment Function Scale Zero One
- [`hai_scale_zscore_augment()`](https://www.spsanderson.com/healthyR.ai/reference/hai_scale_zscore_augment.md)
  : Augment Function Scale Zero One
- [`hai_winsorized_move_augment()`](https://www.spsanderson.com/healthyR.ai/reference/hai_winsorized_move_augment.md)
  : Augment Function Winsorize Move
- [`hai_winsorized_truncate_augment()`](https://www.spsanderson.com/healthyR.ai/reference/hai_winsorized_truncate_augment.md)
  : Augment Function Winsorize Truncate

## Miscellaneous Functions

- [`hai_range_statistic()`](https://www.spsanderson.com/healthyR.ai/reference/hai_range_statistic.md)
  : Get the range statistic
- [`hai_skewed_features()`](https://www.spsanderson.com/healthyR.ai/reference/hai_skewed_features.md)
  : Get Skewed Feature Columns

## Metric Sets

- [`hai_default_classification_metric_set()`](https://www.spsanderson.com/healthyR.ai/reference/hai_default_classification_metric_set.md)
  : Metric Set
- [`hai_default_regression_metric_set()`](https://www.spsanderson.com/healthyR.ai/reference/hai_default_regression_metric_set.md)
  : Metric Set
